elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Which statement about needs and goods is correct and which is incorrect? Correct the incorrect statement.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: The starting point for economic activity is the goods and services offered by companies to their customers.

elements.name: Allfällige Korrektur
elements.title: Possible correction
elements.correctAnswer: The starting point for economic activity is the needs of the people that are offered to customers.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Which statement about needs and goods is correct and which is incorrect? Correct the incorrect statement.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: As soon as subsistence and elective needs are covered, the economy can no longer continue to grow.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Possible correction
elements.correctAnswer: Needs are unlimited and can therefore never all be satisfied.
